responses: Hi there, how can I help?

The Assam Royal Global University(RGU) is a full-fledged Private University established under section 2(f) of the UGC Act and is included in the list of universities maintained by University Grants Commission with the right to confer degrees as per Section 22 of UGC Act, 1956.
 For more information visit https://www.rgu.ac/

patterns: When should I come to college?
responses:
College is open 9 a.m. - 5 p.m. Monday to Friday
 Saturday is holiday

Who is the head of CSE department?
responses: Dr. Aniruddha Deka is the head of CSE department and visit https://www.rgu.ac/rsetfaculty.php to know more

patterns: What are differnt clubs in RGU?
responses:
The clubs are: 
 SIGMA VOICE - English literature club 
 CONFLUENCE - Dance and Singing club 
 Media club
 Ethnos - The HR Club
 Sports Club
 Helping Hands-The Social Welfare Club

patterns: How is the library of RGU
responses:
The Cental Library of RGU is located at the 1st floor of B-block.
 The library remains open from 9.00 am to 5.00 pm (winter) and 9.00 am to 6.00 pm (summer) on all working days of the university.
